meanings.sent1: The child had the effrontery to ask for more candy after already eating a whole bag.
meanings.sent2: His effrontery in asking for a raise after only a week of work surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed effrontery by stealing nuts right in front of the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her effrontery in wearing pajamas to a formal event was quite shocking.
meanings.sent5: The politician's effrontery in denying the accusations was met with disbelief.

meanings.sent1: The explorer's effrontery in venturing into the uncharted jungle was admirable.
meanings.sent2: Her effrontery in skydiving without any training was risky.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed effrontery by trying to catch a bird twice its size.
meanings.sent4: His effrontery in challenging the champion boxer was seen as foolish.
meanings.sent5: The student's effrontery in asking the teacher to cancel the exam was bold.

meanings.sent1: The teenager's effrontery in talking back to his parents was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: Her effrontery in laughing during the serious meeting offended her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The monkey showed effrontery by stealing the zookeeper's hat and wearing it.
meanings.sent4: His effrontery in ignoring the rules led to serious consequences.
meanings.sent5: The customer's effrontery in demanding a refund for a used product was outrageous.
